feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 07:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
